value:
It's just one festival after the other! I
can't say I really have the time, but I
suppose I must admit they're fun.

I can't speak to my competition, but
I'm adept at selecting the right gift.
Among my family, anyway.

So it's to be a competition, is it? To
select the gift that resonates most? I
shall receive the most ardent thanks!

Yes, I can see how it would be tough
to find a gift for me. Wait...don't tell
me that you're fixated on tomatoes!

Oh, you are persistent. Trust me. I'm
considering the ideal gifts for my
family, retainers, and, yes, even you.

I have a Day of Devotion invitation
to deliver. Let's see...the name
$Nu is inscribed.

It is a festival, after all. We should
enjoy it to the fullest. This celebration
shall be magnificent!

I can see that you tried, but really...
A gift like this simply can't touch
the heart. Put some thought into it.

This is just how things turn out
sometimes. There's no use getting
worked up.

Did you choose this for me? You've
got good taste—I'll give you that.

I am Leo of Nohr. This Day of
Devotion is another test I shall
pass with flying colors, no doubt.

Here we are. You are last on my list.
It seems you have received a lot of
gifts already, but mine is unique.$k$pI have noted the sweet smiles and
kind words that have come along
with the gifts, so let me try...$k$pAhem. You always put me ahead of
yourself, so I just wanted you to know
I'm thinking about you too!$k$pDon't you dare forget that you'll
always mean the world to me, dear
summoner!$k$pWhat's with the look? Lost for words?
Well... No matter! I must have melted
your heart into a cute little puddle.$k$pIt's exceedingly rare that I express
gratitude at all, so consider this
festival a success indeed.$k$pJust forking over a box of candy is
a tired cliché, so I decided to spice
things up. You should be overjoyed!
Accept my thanks.
I got you something.
Gift incoming!
It's the Day of Devotion!
No thanks...
The Day of Devotion, you say? I guess I could take part, if it means that much to you.
Come now, that's enough of that.
Family comes first, of course, but I also made time to get gifts for my retainers.
I'm rather confident in my ability to choose personalized gifts.
What do I like? Well, I enjoy tomatoes. Though I don't think a tomato would make a very good gift...
If we can learn to appreciate each other, then war may quickly fade.
Of course I have a gift for you! Did you think I'd forget? ...Hmph. Here.
Sure.
Which way?
Let's make a delivery.
